name: ai-kit
description: `ai-kit` is a powerful and easy-to-use Javascript library designed to enhance your AI programming experience, specifically tailored for working with OpenAI. This library simplifies the process of querying OpenAI, extracting information, and performing various AI-related tasks. It contains a collection of creative and handy functions that can be used in a wide range of applications, such as chatbots, AI-driven content generation, SEO, and much more.
author: Hero
